subject: Re: [junit] Anyon else interested in Emacs support for junit
msgSnippet: ... Yes please, Simon! -- John Masson                      Worth Media Interactive Developer          | http://www.worthmedia.net john.masson@worthmedia.net
messageBody:
"Simon A. Crase" <simon@...> writes:

> I have written a simple emacs extension to create a test case class,
> add tests, and insert assertEquals/assertTrue. If anyone else is
> interested, I'll write some doco and make the code available. If
> not, I'll just do enough doco for my own team.

Yes please, Simon!
